item.title: Problem!

item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

100 errors has to do with brackets. Make sure there is a close bracket for every open bracket.

item.title: Problem!
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

ziplock:

It’s playerRights, not playerrights. Java is case sensitive.

ok thanks first problem solved one to go.

item.title: Problem!
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

well, i maded a code so that when my staff logs in it will yell and it will send a different message to them this is my code i got some errors.

if(playerrights >= 0) { sM("Welcome to SeaScape."); sM("::info for some information!"); sM("Enjoy playing!!"); } if(playerrights >= 1) { sM("Welcome to SeaScape."); sM("::info for some information!"); sM("Respect your moderator status!"); sM("Respect all players!"); sM(" typ ::modcommands for the commands"); sM("Enjoy playing!"); } if(playerrights >= 2) { sM("Welcome to SeaScape."); sM("::info for some information!"); sM("Respect your administrator status!"); sM("Respect all players!"); sM("typ ::admincommands for the commands"); sM("Enjoy playing!"); } if(playerrights >= 3) { sM("Welcome to SeaScape."); sM("::info for some information!"); sM("Respect your Owner status!"); sM("Respect all players!"); sM("typ ::ownercommands for the commands"); sM("Enjoy playing!"); }
with this code i get this errors

client.java:10080: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerrights location: class client if((playerrights > 0)) { ^ client.java:10085: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerrights location: class client if((playerrights > 1)) { ^ client.java:10093: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerrights location: class client if((playerrights > 2)) { ^ client.java:10101: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerrights location: class client if((playerrights > 3)) { ^ Note: objectLoader.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 4 errors You have sucsessfully compiled Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
with the secoond part i got 100 errors.

if(playerrights == 1) { yell(@blu@ the moderator, @red@+ "playername" +,@red@ has logged in.@blu@); } if(playerrights == 2) { yell(@blu@ the administrator, @red@+ "playername" +,@red@ has logged in.@blu@); } if(playerrights == 3) { yell(@blu@ the owner, @red@+ "playername" +,@red@ has logged in.@blu@); }
hope you guys can help me?
btw i’m using back to the basics from lin
